text: Rico Rodriguez MBE (born Emmanuel Rodriguez; 17 October 1934[ Allmusic.com biography] - 4 September 2015), also known as simply Rico, as well as Reco or El Reco, was a Cuban ska and reggae trombonist. He was born in Havana and grew up in Kingston, Jamaica. He has recorded with many producers, including Karl Pitterson, Prince Buster, and Lloyd "Matador" Daley. He was known as one of the first and most distinguished Ska artists. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Musicians from Havana Category:Musicians from Kingston, Jamaica
title: Rico Rodriguez (musician)
